Package mdd.components

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdd.components.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Allocable, Freeable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CostNode, PNode, SNode
    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements Allocable
    This class is used to represent a node of a MDD.
    The Node might be the most important structure in the MDD. It contains all information about its parents and its children. Furthermore, you can associate other node to a given node, which is notably useful during operations such as intersection or union.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  Node.Allocator
      The allocator that is in charge of the Node type.
      When not specified, the allocator has an initial capacity of 16.
